title: Is anyone elses main practically unplayable right now due to the meta?
body: I went from a 67% win rate in season 5 to a 57% win rate in season 6 to a 47% win rate in season 7. {{item:3070}} {{champion:131}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: {{champion:77}} RIP
right like udyr has dropped off the face of the earth

Ah yes, the complaint of one who was an original Galio main. I was one too. All 14 of us Galio mains lost something special with that rework.

Jinx is in an ok spot rn tho

no she's subpar.

A little jump from others dropping but not enough to warrant ok state.

> [{quoted}](name=coeurloyal,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JE7Q5FpU,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-30T14:42:29.115+0000)

You mean Diana dude?

Where? This is bad. Really bad. I don't want her becoming popular.

Use discussion view, otherwise you'll have no context for anything outside of GD.

"She" was referring to Jinx (who YaRossy brought up), not Diana.

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JE7Q5FpU,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-30T01:19:53.697+0000)
>
> no she's subpar.
> 
> A little jump from others dropping but not enough to warrant ok state.

Isn't she a very strong hyper carry atm...  Only thing I see that's not "ok"  is her early game.  Which is how it should be.  Especially with that runaans + Q nonsense in team fights.
She's alright, but she's a worse Trist/Twitch right now.  If they're banned, sure she's great.

Where is this proof that Jinx is "strong"?

Because she can use Ardent better than a few other ADCs? Is that it?

Shes not, the only time she's great is if twitch/draven/trist/ maybe cait maybe/sivir are all banned out or picked already.

She'd not horrible, but she's not great like these people think she is when shes outclassed hard currently and rarely makes it to that late game carry status that others reach before she does.

but instead of using a logical argument they just downvote and leave because they a board warriors.

everyone I play is no good atm

bruiser meta come back

its not the champs... 

sorry someone had to tell you
bruisers are oppressed
bruisers are oppressed x2

Hi im fullbuild jax with 300 armor on ult and 3500 health oh i stay a second in a teamfight and i'm dead.
Welp. 
I can't even 1v1 the xayah XD. 
BRUISERS ARE FINE GUYS.

You are doing something terribly wrong if Xayah alone is beating your jax O_O


Only Marksman that can beat Jax 1v1 is Vayne.

Even then Vayne has to play basically perfect to beat him.  Jax one-shots ADCs with his current popular build.  These people are delusional, Jax is in a great spot in the meta, and easily one of the best top laners.

Nah he actually sounded realistic


Jax gets instagibed/ignored in temafights

He said 1v1.

He get's beaten 1v1 by enemy xayah playing Jax.


You're telling me this is reasonable? That the one skirmishers that is doing rather well for a long time now made to kill marksmen is getting spanked 1v1 by one of the weaker ones?
thinking xayah is one of the weaker ones, lol

She´s not on par with {{champion:119}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:67}} or even{{champion:236}}  in a straight fight.

Even {{champion:29}}  is better if we assume he does a sneak attack. {{champion:51}}  is also debatable. 


Xayah is limited by her E, a good deal of her powerbudget goes into an ability that's really isn't too hard to dodge as long as you move around.


Jax just needs to jump on her and stand on the opposite side of her and she will never land it, that's why i call her weak.


Altho i´ll admit that her E is extremely good as a followup ability or a reaction in a chaotic fight, however 1v1 when the enemy is focused on you it's kinda subpar. 



I´ve beaten Xayah 1v1 with Ashe, it's fairly easy even x)

I ll give you high elo adc tier list your is a bit off


 Tier 0 ADC Tristana,Twitch

If you let {{champion:29}}   hit 3 autos on 4 people you ll lose teamfight against him.  Twitch is the only ADC who initiates 1vs5 fights and probably the only champion who initiates without CC (Death is best cc)

{{champion:18}}  is the safest botlane hypercarry who crushes towers. Great for rotations. Hard to gank. Hard to assassinate, can cleanup. Mindblowing dps


 Tier 1 ADC. Xayah,Kog maw
{{champion:96}}  is pretty much poke version of twitch without stealth. 
{{champion:498}}  compared to twitch is also a teamfight piercer without stealth and range but she has a root and Her ultimate which makes her incredibly hard to focus and honestly her root is quite deadly

Tier 1.5 {{champion:222}}  
Just a solid champion gets towers faster then kog maw, but kog maw is slightly better
{{champion:119}} 
Really good bully vulnerable to ganks more then ever since last nerf 
(And Personaly yasuo but he isnt widespread adc pick)


tier Almost irelevant but still viable
{{champion:22}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:429}} 
Now if you are playing ranked teams Kalista and ashe jump to tier 1.5
{{champion:236}}  can be played in bunch of lanes but we are talking about botlane AD tier list. Lucian as a champion would be rated higher if we looked globaly

Trash tier
{{champion:67}}  (There are AD carries which delete multiple champions at once..)

{{champion:51}}  ehm she is at 45% winrate for a reason nerfed hard

{{champion:110}}  Outclassed by jinx mainly..
{{champion:202}}  The ulti nerf made him quite irelevant he is counter to some random lower tier AD carries which have low range. He might deserve higher I JUST PERSONALY hate having jhin on my team specially in this ardent meta

The question was who beats who in a 1v1.

I started arguing with people when someone claimed {{champion:498}}  beats jax and someone else said jax is irrelevant in teamfights to which i both argued.


Then on a followup to why Xayah isn't great 1v1 i went and named a few that i believe to be strong 1v1 to try and elaborate on that.

well Xayah is not weak 1vs1

She would just kite him backwards root him dodge his counterstrike with ultimate and delete him...


Bruisers are in horrible condition atm

One does not simply kite a Jax. 


Triforce, randuin and a 3-4 seconds CD leap ensures that. 

And divers and skirmishers might be doing poorly but jax is doing well.


His winrates have remained solid despite a increasing amount of players.

Altho not that many i think x)



If Xayah dodges Jax E with her ulti then she will have to land her E right away after, of jax will smack right through her healthbar.


Issue is, jax has the mobility and speed to dodge it. 

Xayah genrally does not handle that deal well.


'tis is all based on my experience playing both those champs which is flawed since i haven't mained either really hard.


Altho i am a somewhat long time jax player.
im ulted nasus with 4k health and 400 armor 200 mr here i go walking into the teamfight and now i'm dead to twitch
Xayah is broken so..
Nothing can stop us, not even terrain {{champion:432}}
Amen, brother bear. I'm moving over to bard from Maokai (haven't fully committed yet) but his aggressive build is uh-may-zing. Once he gets Nashor's Tooth he's basically an assassin.
A Bard with {{item:3057}} and {{item:3151}} is certainly a threat to consider. I also enjoy 2 shotting adc's mid games after a couple of chimes lol. Welcome.
Bards meep dmg is gross early on
The only reason it isn't later is because most of them don't build damage.
Really? Over Nashor's? Why do you take that over other items?
The Liandries burn applies on the entire cone, it's amazing for teamfights. Oh and sheen is a personally favourite, the early cheese is amazing lmao

Not really.

Actually I've come to find {{champion:131}} easier to play.

Between the mana cost buffs, Passive buff and the dorans ring nerfs, I get poked out of mid lane a lot less than I used to. I can grab my catalyst and win most matchups.

{{champion:131}} doesn't get punished as hard in lane anymore and still has the ability to blow people up.

2 Seasons ago there were so many matchups that would just zone me out because mana management wasn't as much of an issue as it is now. Double dorans were really strong.

As for jungling with her, I don't like it. It's too squishy, and doesn't offer enough to the team. I prefer to pick champions like Elise (Rylais build) or Sejuani for their CC and ability to set up kills for their carries.

Master yi. 
The jungle catch up xp along with long camp respawn timers
{{champion:92}} She never becomes too bad or unplayable but laning is super hard due to tanks in the last like 5 patches also, peel supports and {{summoner:3}}
kek

{{champion:43}} is not faring to well in this meta despite enchanter items being overtuned. 

44% in support and 42% win rates in mid, it's only going to get worse when the items get the nerf bat after Worlds. {{item:3070}} 

Rito hit her hard in nerfs before they realized that maybe it was the enchanter **items** that was the problem. 

Though I don't think Karma ever even approached the high 50s in win rate in Solo Q. She was only ever strong in LCS where games don't exist beyond 25 minutes. :(
